post.description:
Open a new graph using the specified schema. If a schema is not specified, the default schema is used.

This call is asynchronous: the client must check for an active graph.

parameters.name: schema
parameters.description: The schema of the new graph.

parameters.name: X-CONSTELLATION-SECRET
parameters.description: CONSTELLATION secret (from ~/.CONSTELLATION/rest.json)

post.description: Run the named plugin on the active graph. (Currently, parameters cannot be passed to the plugin.)

parameters.name: graph_id
parameters.description: The id of the associated graph

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the plugin to run.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: A JSON representation of a dictionary of the parameter names and values to be passed to the plugin.

parameters.name: X-CONSTELLATION-SECRET
parameters.description: CONSTELLATION secret (from ~/.CONSTELLATION/rest.json)

parameters.name: alias
parameters.description: If true, plugin aliases are listed, otherwise the full plugin names are listed.

parameters.name: X-CONSTELLATION-SECRET
parameters.description: CONSTELLATION secret (from ~/.CONSTELLATION/rest.json)

post.description: Add a RecordStore to a graph.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A JSON representation of the RecordStore data, in the form {"columns": ["COL1","COL2","COL3"], "data": [[r1c1, r1c2, r1c3],[r2c1,r2c2,r2c3]]. This is the same as the output of pandas.DataFrame.to_json(orient='split', date_format='iso').

parameters.name: graph_id
parameters.description: The id of the associated graph

parameters.name: complete_with_schema
parameters.description: If true (the default), perform a schema completion after the RecordStore is added.

parameters.name: arrange
parameters.description: If not specifed (the default), perform a basic arrange of the graph after the RecordStore is added. If specified, the named plugin is run, or no plugin is run if the name is '' or 'None'.

parameters.name: reset_view
parameters.description: If true (the default), run the ResetView plugin after adding, completing, and arranging.

parameters.name: X-CONSTELLATION-SECRET
parameters.description: CONSTELLATION secret (from ~/.CONSTELLATION/rest.json)
